articles.title: No cheat days, dairy or junk food: Ex-CEO's health U-turn after wake-up call - AsiaOne
articles.description: Alex Mearns had high cholesterol, high blood pressure and prediabetes after years of smoking, alcohol and unhealthy food. He changed his diet, lost weight and transformed his health.
